Text:
if you ( everybody ) look at a torrent and it has no screenshots or link to boxcover/official info about the file  google it and copy and paste links to the info to help everyone else out ! dont be lazy and expect the uploaders to do everything..do it yourself.

everyone please provide links to boxcovers and official info for every file you look at thanks
use imdb.com  and google to find out info

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1462054/

@zeitgeistmandvdrip, if you look at a torrent and miss the plot and imdb URL, don't assume it's because it's not there.

Re-read the description again, you'll see TvTeam has provided all that information.

Here it is again, just like above:
